item.description:
Hello Masterminders!

 

We're picking up again and starting our MeetUps this Monday

for a lunchtime meeting, 12-1.

 

We'll be having a casual conversation around the Author's Preface.

 

Please bring your book, as we will be reading from them.  If you haven't bought the book yet,

you can purchase from Amazon, the one I'll be using, "Think and Grow Rich!" The Origininal

Version, Restored and Revised, Napoleon Hill, Aventine Press, forward by Ross Cornwell.

group.name: Think and Grow Rich MasterMind Study Group

item.name: Talk about Think and Grow Rich!
